bio: Jaspar Gaerston is an aspiring writer living in Dawnstar. He can often be found at the lighthouse, staring out at the boundless ocean known as the Sea of Ghosts. Pessimistic and forlorn, Jaspar’s depression only worsens when his manuscript is rejected by the acclaimed novelist, Adonato Leotelli. Jaspar keeps Adonato’s book, Olaf and the Dragon, on his person. He is gay.
name: Jaspar Gaerston
